evidence.claim: Dewi Kreckman employs HIPAA compliance for data protection.
The company utilizes HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange.
Their infrastructure incorporates cloud services for secure data management.
Proof of EHR integration capabilities noted in their case studies.
The company lists their adherence to health-tech standards on their careers page.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of involvement with X12 transactions or EDI processes.
